channel.title: The Psychedelic Explorers Guide on Rika's website
channel.description: Recent content in The Psychedelic Explorers Guide on Rika's website

item.title: Psychedelics and Personality
item.description: “I saw that the personality of man is like layer upon layer of glass. The specific vision was of irregular but cleanly geometric pieces, each behind the other onto infinity. Each piece of glass was attached on pivots at the top and bottom. At any place, if any piece were turned slightly it would reflect an external picture and, like a mirror, block any further vision inside.
